item.title: Lost Paradise: Remembering the Short-Lived Paradise Hotel & Casino Las Vegas
item.description:
A Fleeting Taste of Paradise on Tropicana Avenue

For those of us who love digging into the layers of Las Vegas history, there are stories of titans like Bugsy Siegel and Howard Hughes. But then there are the smaller, often forgotten ventures â€“ the ambitious dreams that flickered brightly, then faded too soon. The Paradise Hotel and Casino is one such story, a curious blip on the timeline of the Las Vegas Strip.
